channel.title: MantisBT
channel.description: I installed MantisBT on my server, but after the installation I can't login. If I click "lost your password?" and enter the email adress and username from the database user table of mantis, it says "wrong email". What the hell is this thing doing?

item.title: MantisBT
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
hm, no idea?
still doesn’t work, I re-installed it already several times with rewritten configs.

Read full topic

item.title: MantisBT
item.dc:creator: pfannkuchen_gesicht
item.description:
I installed MantisBT on my server, but after the installation I can’t login.
If I click “lost your password?” and enter the email adress and username from the database user table of mantis, it says “wrong email”.
What the hell is this thing doing?
